description.p: butt (broadcast using this tool) is an easy to use, multi OS streaming tool. It supports SHOUTcast and Icecast and runs on Linux, Mac OS X and Windows (64 Bit only since version 0.1.20). The main purpose of butt is to stream live audio data from your computers Mic or Line input to a Shoutcast or Icecast server. If you want you can also record your session.
